thread.section_title: PromGirl Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PromGirl | www.promgirl.com | 10 of 523
thread.title: Maggie

author: Maggie
title: Maggie
text: These dresses are of the highest quality and always come in looking the way they should. They are not fakeups. These are real, designer dresses. Shipping time never strays too far away from the date chosen. I'm very picky when it comes to dresses and this site has thousands - it's very easy to look through them all. I have no issues with the website. I always recommend this site. However, I would recommend ordering two sizes and returning the one that doesn't work out incase of a sizing difference. Returns are very easy.
